actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit for social security taxes paid in 1981 and 1982.
short_title: Social Security Payroll Credit Act of 1980
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Payroll Credit Act of 1980 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers, employees, and self-employed individuals an income tax credit equal to ten percent of the amount of social security taxes paid by such individuals in 1981 or 1982.

titles.title: Social Security Payroll Credit Act of 1980
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit for social security taxes paid in 1981 and 1982.
